package.name: XML_XPath
package.summary: Xpath/DOM XML manipulation, maneuvering and query interface.
package.description: Allows for easy manipulation, maneuvering and querying of a domxml tree using both xpath queries and DOM walk functions. It uses an internal pointer for all methods on which the action is performed. Results from an xpath query are returned as an XPath_Result object, which contains all the DOM functions from the main object. This class tries to hold as close as possible to the DOM Recommendation.

release.notes: This is the initial independent PEAR release.
